card.name: Righteous Reforging
card.text: Search your library for an equipment card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Put an indestructible counter on that equipment. You may attach it to a creature you control.

card.text: Surveil 2, then draw a card.

card.name: UU12 Voracious Elasmodracid
card.text: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island. {1}{U}, Discard this card: You get a Moonstone counter.

card.name: Skallayt, Ambitious Warlord
card.text: Menace, vigilance, trample As long as an opponent controls more lands or has more Moonstone counters than you, other creatures you control have menace and get +1/+0. Otherwise, other creatures you control have vigilance and get +0/+1.

card.name: Moonstones MST
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls deal combat damage to you while you have more Moonstone counters than they do, that opponent gets a Moonstone counter. Remove two Moonstone counters from yourself: Scry 2. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery.

card.name: Courageous Assembly
card.text: Create a token copy of each paladin creature you control. (Armies, Heroes, Knights, Soldiers and Warriors are paladins.)

card.name: Leave No Witnesses
card.text: Destroy all non-outlaw creatures. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)

card.text: When this creature enters, you may remove a Moonstone counter from yourself. If you do, it gains haste until end of turn. First strike

card.name: UM01 Circumzenith Guardian
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever you attack, creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: UM01 Icon of Dead Futures
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent reveals X cards from their hand, where X is the number of Moonstone counters you have, and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: UM01 Deathspark Speaker
card.text: Ward—Exile two cards from your graveyard {B}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: This creature deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.

card.name: UM01 Fireseed WIP
card.text: {2}{G}: Mill 3 cards. You may return a land card in your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. {1}{R}, Discard a card: This enchantment deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of land cards put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery.

card.name: UM01 Laughing Path Master
card.text: Whenever another creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained 3 or more life this turn, draw a card.

card.name: UM01 Mayarai, Bonesnouts Leader
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, create a 1/1 black Rat Rogue creature token with menace. Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw a card and gain 1 life.

card.name: UM01 Flux-node Birthing
card.text: Wisdom 4 (As an additional cost to cast this, you may exile 4 cards from your graveyard. If you do, copy it, and you may choose new targets for the copy.) Whenever you pay a Wisdom cost, create a 2/2 blue and red Drake Elemental creature token with flying.

card.name: UM01 Taza, Exiled Princess
card.text: When Taza enters, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. Other Rat creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of combat, target Rat you control gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.text: When this creature enters, search your library for a paladin card, reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Armies, Heroes, Knights, Soldiers and Warriors are paladins.) Paladin creatures you control have haste.

card.text: When this creature enters, you get a Moonstone counter. {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery, and only if you have 3 or more Moonstone counters.

card.text: Mill four cards, then return a land card milled this way to your hand. If nongreen, noncolorless mana was spent to cast this spell, you may instead return a nonland card milled this way to your hand.
